root.name: Safecracker: The Ultimate Puzzle Adventure
root.description: OverviewDeveloped by Kheops Studio and published by Big Fish Games, Safecracker: the Ultimate Puzzle Adventure is a point click adventure filled with intricate puzzles that the player must solve with both a sheer logical approach and/or by gathering clues and evidence around the mansion the game takes place in.StoryTaken from Big Fish: As an expert Safecracker, you are hired by the wealthy family of a recently deceased billionaire to search for the last will and testament of their late relative, Duncan W. Adams. An avid safe collector and an "eccentric" to say the least, Adams has hidden the deed to his riches in one of the 35 safes scattered in his extravagant mansion. The stakes are high. Use your expertise, wits, and puzzle solving skills to crack them all and earn your pay check. System Requirements MinimumRecommendedOperating System: Windows® 2000/XP Processor: 800 MHz Pentium® III or equivalent / faster RAM Memory: 64 MB Video Card: 64 MBDirectX: 9.0c Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatibleOperating System: Windows XP Processor: 1 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or equivalent / faster RAM Memory: 128 MB Video Card: 64 MB DirectX: 9.0c Sound Card: 3D compatible sound card
